variable.name: tp_weaponorder
variable.description: This allows you to define the order from best to worst weapon. The default value is "78564321", which means that the Rocket Launcher is the best weapon (impulse 7) then Lightning Gun (impulse 8), Super Nailgun (impulse 5), Grenade Launcher (impulse 6), Nailgun (impulse 4), Super Shotgun (impulse 3), Shotgun (impulse 2), Axe (impulse 1).
